core_lab.name: Human Pattern Lab — Core Lab
core_lab.description: The central hub of the Human Pattern Lab, where research on human behavior, systems, and stories comes together into a shared map of "how we tend to be".

raccoon_behavioral_sciences.name: Raccoon Behavioral Sciences Department
raccoon_behavioral_sciences.description: Dedicated to the study of curiosity, distraction, social scavenging, and joyful chaos, primarily through the lens of raccoon-adjacent behavior patterns.

emotional_weather_forecasting.name: Emotional Weather Forecasting Department
emotional_weather_forecasting.description: Tracks emotional climates across teams, detects hidden storms like resentment drizzle and anxiety squalls, and helps design healthier emotional ecosystems.

feline_epistemology.name: Feline Epistemology Department
feline_epistemology.description: Investigates how creatures—especially cats—decide what to trust, when to ignore, and when to suddenly sprint at 3 a.m. in the hallway for no apparent reason.
